function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 outbreak on aviation industry, leading to reduced annual RPKs and revenues","Impact":"Significant reduction in annual RPKs and revenues for Asia/Pacific airlines","Mitigation":"Investing in COVID-19 mitigation measures and adapting to changing travel trends","Technologies":"Improved sanitation, contactless technology, air filtration systems","People":"Airline industry stakeholders, travelers, aviation employees","Owner":"Airline companies, industry regulators"},{"Description":"Focus on environmentally sustainable models due to reduced carbon/greenhouse gas emissions during the pandemic","Impact":"Changes in business models and research priorities for the aviation industry","Mitigation":"Emphasizing R&D on environmentally sustainable solutions","Technologies":"Fuel efficiency technology, waste management systems, recycling technologies","People":"Aviation industry stakeholders, environmental organizations","Owner":"Aviation companies, environmental organizations"}]}
